Now you can easily pay everything you buy from the supermarket via QR Code from the smart wallet! Scan the merchant QR code to pay your purchases with your mobile phone. Try the new service in Spence until October 15, 2020 and be one of the first 1000 customers to earn promo code kwd 50 to use in Spence.
If you still have the smart wallet from CIB, subscribe now and send your national number in SMS on 4435 until the end of September 2020. And if you want to know more about the new payment method, watch this video https://youtu.be/8nz3HXn3C7c, and for more information about the wallet Smart visit our website ne.link/jP7CSXH or call 19716.
Minimum purchases are 100 pounds to receive promo code, and you can use it until October 31, 2020.
Terms and conditions apply.
